channel.description: Recent content in Writing on c13u's Blog

item.title: [Summary] (Hacker News) Must and Must Not: On Writing Documentation
item.description: Must and Must Not: On Writing Documentation. Hacker News. https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=21743100. Dec 9th, 2019. Revise documentation, many times, on separate days. What seemed perfectly clear yesterday will come across as ambiguous/confusing today. Beware of ambiguities, especially those that bubble between native speakers and non-native ones e.g. “X may not do Y” X possibly doesn't do Y It's strictly forbidden that X do Y “X Must Not” Not a must => You don't have to, but you can It's strictly forbidden Put yourself into different roles, e.
